name: Poison Tipped Arrow
printed_effect:
When an opponent Casts an Elestral you can
target it and give it -2 {attack} until the End Phase.
During this turn’s End Phase you can
Expend {omni} equal to that target’s Enchantment
Cost in order to destroy it.
effect: This Poison Tipped Arrow can only be played when an opponent Casts an Elestral. Target it and give it -2 {attack} until the next turn. During this End Phase you can Expend {omni} equal to its Enchantment Cost in order to destroy it.
